siwu wana sathiya (ruwan geyi wada sitima)buddhagayawa ranin babalawimamaranasannaye sithehi pahala wana dasun eelanga bhawayata balapanawada?karmayata mula chethanawayibauddhayini, yushmathunge urumaya rakaganiwbodu mangata piwisenna; grasthiyen midennasakko (siya wagakim pilibanda hakiyawak aththeku wima)gihiyo andanawa dukwenawa walapenawa dakala nadda oya unnanse?hadawathata awankawa jiwathwimanamo buddhayathayilanthaye watpasi katina pinkama owun dutu sati....ajan brahmawanso maha therun wahansesathuro saha mithurosathuta tharam wena dhanayak lowe koyindalankawe prathama warata brel kramayata piruwana poth wahanse pariwarthanaya kirimaaloka udapadi pataka samajanawa arahadi budu guna bhawanawathriwidha rathnaye balaya pilibanda mata thibenne achala wishwasayakthemiya kumarayage kathawakawi sankalpanaderatak ya kala asirimath pinkamameya apata suwisheshayi'watfo' wiharaye budupilimaya...'wattrayimt' wiharaye budupilimaya...'watarun' wiharaya...siyama hewath thayilanthaya saha shri lankawa siya was gananak thisse bududahama bhakthiyen ha gaurawayen rakagath therawadi bauddha ratawal ya.
